title: Witness to history
creator_credit: Susan Eikov Green and Guidance Associates
brief_description: This series of four progams examines different aspects of 20th. century history. ‘Turn of the century America’ looks at the United States and the major changes which occured from 1890-1920. ‘The Russian Revolution’ features archival footage depicting this historic event. ‘WW2-The dark years in Europe’ covers the events which led to the outbreak of war in Western Europe’ ‘Europe after WW2’ looks at a range of events which shaped post-war Europe.
